mapper.select: SELECT h.apt_seq AS aptSeq, h.apt_nm AS aptName, LEFT(d.dong_code, 5) AS dongCode, d.sido_name AS sidoName, d.gugun_name AS gugunName, d.dong_name AS dongName, h.road_nm AS roadNm, h.road_nm_bonbun AS roadNmBonbun, h.road_nm_bubun AS roadNmBubun, h.build_year AS buildYear, h.latitude, h.longitude FROM houseinfos h JOIN dongcodes d ON CONCAT(h.sgg_cd, h.umd_cd) = d.dong_code WHERE (#{dongCode} IS NULL OR d.dong_code = #{dongCode}) AND (#{aptName} IS NULL OR h.apt_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{aptName}, '%')) AND h.latitude IS NOT NULL LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM houseinfos h JOIN dongcodes d ON CONCAT(h.sgg_cd, h.umd_cd) = d.dong_code WHERE (#{dongCode} IS NULL OR d.dong_code = #{dongCode}) AND (#{aptName} IS NULL OR h.apt_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{aptName}, '%')) AND h.latitude IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT sido_name FROM dongcodes ORDER BY sido_name
SELECT DISTINCT gugun_name FROM dongcodes WHERE sido_name = #{sido} AND gugun_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gugun_name
SELECT DISTINCT dong_name AS dongName, dong_code AS dongCode FROM dongcodes WHERE gugun_name = #{gugun} AND dong_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY dong_name
